00010 class MOC_Log_Adapter_Console extends MOC_Log_Adapter_Abstract {
00011 
00012     const COLOR_NONE = "\033[00m";
00013 
00014     const COLOR_BOLD = "\033[01m";
00015 
00016     const COLOR_UNDERSCORE = "\033[04m";
00017 
00018     const COLOR_BLINK = "\033[05m";
00019 
00020     const COLOR_REVERSE = "\033[07m";
00021 
00022     const COLOR_CONCEALED = "\033[08m";
00023 
00024     const COLOR_BLACK = "\033[30m";
00025 
00026     const COLOR_RED = "\033[31m";
00027 
00028     const COLOR_GREEN = "\033[32m";
00029 
00030     const COLOR_YELLOW = "\033[33m";
00031 
00032     const COLOR_BLUE = "\033[1;34m";
00033 
00034     const COLOR_MAGENTA = "\033[35m";
00035 
00036     const COLOR_CYAN = "\033[36m";
00037 
00038     const COLOR_WHITE = "\033[37m";
00039 
00040     const COLOR_GRAY = "\033[1;30m";
00041 
00050     public function add($severity, $message, $ext_key = null, $additional_info = null) {
00051         switch ($severity) {
00052             case LOG_DEBUG:
00053                 $message = sprintf('[::GRAY::DEBUG::NONE::]  %s', $message);
00054                 break;
00055             case LOG_INFO:
00056                 $message = sprintf('[::BLUE::INFO::NONE::]   %s', $message);
00057                 break;
00058             case LOG_NOTICE:
00059                 $message = sprintf('[::GREEN::NOTICE::NONE::] %s', $message);
00060                 break;
00061             case LOG_WARNING:
00062                 $message = sprintf('[::YELLOW::WARNING::NONE::] %s', $message);
00063                 break;
00064             case LOG_ALERT:
00065                 $message = sprintf('[::RED::ALERT::NONE::] %s', $message);
00066                 break;
00067             case LOG_ERR:
00068                 $message = sprintf('[::RED::ERROR::NONE::] %s', $message);
00069                 break;
00070         }
00071 
00072         if (0 !== preg_match_all('#::([a-z]+)::#sim', $message, $colors)) {
00073             for ($i = 0; $i < sizeof($colors[0]); $i++) {
00074                 $message = str_replace($colors[0][$i], constant('MOC_Log_Adapter_Console::COLOR_' . strtoupper($colors[1][$i])), $message);
00075             }
00076         }
00077 
00078         echo $message . "\n";
00079     }
00080 }
